title: LG 260 L Frost Free Double Door Top Mount 3 Star Refrigerator  (Shiny Steel, GL-I292RPZX)

product_specification.Other Performance Features: Smart Inverter, Door Cooling+, Express Freezing, Works without Stabilizer, Smart Diagnosis, Smart Connect, Jet Ice
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor from LG
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Smart Inverter Compressor Technology: Featuring Smart Inverter Compressor technology, the LG 260 L Frost-free Refrigerator helps save energy and creates very low operation sounds.
product_description.LG Door Cooling+: Thanks to LG Door Cooling+, this refrigerator evenly cools its insides at a high rate, which ensures that the temperature at the door and the insides are the same. So, your food items and bottles at the door also become cool and remain fresh.

review:
Very nice looking and powerful fridge, no need to think much.....easy settings and smooth setup, no noise just perfect cooling.

Top part don’t have LED light

Cons - 1. racks are fixed no additional racks are provided to adjust big utensils 2. only one egg try 3. freezer do not have LED light however it is mentioned in the product features 4. compressor area is open, LG has not provide any external cover for compressor 5. Bottle holder is of regular size, do not have big bottle holder like samsung fridge Pros - 1. Build in stabalizer n Inverter 2. 4 Star energy rating 3. Very Good Cooling 4. glass shelfs are of very good quality 5. Door lock n Open Door alarm 6. I must say the over all quality of product is very good Over All Good Product for family of 2-3 persons, My Advice go for 290L plus if u have bigger family

very nice and smart product by LG. it is what I had As expected and as seen the product online as it is. i just love it's look and smart features. I give 5 star for this Refrigerator as it runs very smoothly not a single sound from fridge very silent working, even firstly you will not get to know that its actually running. Flipkart delivery is on time but I have to wait complete 8days for it to received the product. Flipkart and LG brand packing was very good, so product don't have any single scratch on it. i got great discount as compare to shop and other website. I done installation by myself with help of provided LG guide and it's nothing great to do the installation and also you have not to wait for it. just only first you have to fix the place for your refrigerator in home and then you have to wait for at least 4-8 hours to get better result and have to run it for next 24 hrs with no loading of material in it. And still it's working in very good Condition, will see what happen in next coming days.
delivered on time nice product. earlier had LG didn't had even single issue..even demo was good from LG...till now don't had any issue good product worth buying it.

Delivery was spot on.. No hassle at all.. Kudos to flipkart for that... Fridge as such does not keep veggies as fresh as advertised.. There are better designs in market... I took it for linear Compressor tech... It d most silent fridge ever...

As an Engineer my observation and review will be quite long.I have purchased the same fridge from Flipkart's main competitor last year.It was 4 star model that time.On the basis of my recommendation,my sister has decided to buy it from flipkart.

Con-
1.Very Stylish and good looking.
2.Super quite performance.
3.Power factor is near about 0.85
4.Maximum time its runs on 30watt(min 10 watt, varies from 40-70) and 250 watt when it defrosts.For defrosting it takes appx.2 hr. and defrosting happens everyday.
5.Unit consumption is almost 0.90 Kwh/day.( ~ 1 unit)
6.Door open for long time - that sound is quite beneficial.
7.Make sure your model has Ice beam Door cooling( pic attached)
8.You can easily keep 2 L bottle on door shelf.Egg tray also there.22 eggs can be kept by adjusting properly.
9.Shelf quality is very very good.
10.Flipkart has delivered it on time.But installation was done by 3rd party vendor named Jeevs.Not directly by LG Technician.
11.Despite of running 24*7,Fridge body doesnt get heated much.You will barely notice the sound of fridge except when it defrosts.
12.Runs easily on inverter backup.

Dis-
1.No adjustable rack,i.e u cant adjust shelf as ur need.Groove for shelf is fixed.
2.No door open indication at freezer as well as no light.Only lower part has them both.

I.hope those info will be beneficial.

Demonstration was not bad , the guy was in hurry but we are okay for that

Awesome refrigerator,
Flipkart is well known for fast delivery. i have ordered on Monday & refrigerator was delivered by flipkart by next day. specifications & cost wise, this product is awesome. this refrigerator with inverter technonology & 4 star power rating product consumes less power consumption i.e 194 units per year. all basic functionalites are there but it does'nt have lighting in fridger. overall this product is superb.

A damn good product at a very sweet price. Got with exchange plus cashback during Diwali sale. So it makes a very good price point for a 2016 product. Got the product in 4 days after order and got the exchange done without any hassle. Installation guy came the next day, though we already got the fridge setup by ourselves. He just explained the basic stuff.

Review is after 2 days of usage.
1. A premium looking product which pretty much blows you away with its looks. I was unsure about the shiny steel color, but it is just a beauty.
2. The fridge has ample space for all your storage requirements (mine is a 6 member family).
3. The cooling is pretty good and food is kept fresh. Hardly makes any noise and gives you peace of mind as the fridge is 4 star (194 units per year). Would have been perfect if it was a 5 star power rating.
4. LED lighting is pretty cool and not sure why people complain about no light in freezer, I don't find that odd. It was not there in my previous godrej fridge either.
5. Makes ice within an hour or so and twist mechanism to take it out is cool.
6. I need to see if this brings down my EB bill next month.
7. Haven't tried the inverter setup as I'm unsure to do it, though it says it will draw power of only 2 CFLs.
8. Haven't tried the smart connect option either. Seems like a good tool to have it diagnosed.
9. Didn't connect a stabilizer either as the fridge is said to work without stabilizer.

Overall very happy with the product and service from Flipkart. Just go for it, you won't regret it.

PS: A tip, Buying during a sale with exchange offer and cashback/flat discount on the card would give you the best deal.

Nice product delivered as per schedule. Delivery person took my request for delivery change too. Installation was very prompt within 1 hour of delivery installation guys came and installed. Overall very happy with the service and delivery of Flipkart a big thumbs UP. Product is very good.
